name: Beat Saber for Quest Mod
summary: Learn about .QMOD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: BMBF is an app that Beat Saber for Quest players can install on the Oculus Quest. Players use BMBF to download custom songs and install Beat Saber mods. These mods are saved as QMOD files.
Examples of mods that can be added to Beat Saber for Quest using BMBF include:
The ability to search for and download songs
The ability to hide note scores

instructions: QMOD files are not meant to be manually opened. You can install a QMOD file in Beat Saber for Quest by following the instructions included with BMBF.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
